code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def count_subarrays(nums, k)
    max_num = nums.max
    max_indices = []
    nums.each_with_index { |num, i| max_indices << i if num == max_num }
    return 0 if max_indices.size < k
    
    count = 0
    (0...max_indices.size - k + 1).each do |i|
        left = i == 0 ? -1 : max_indices[i - 1]
        right = i + k - 1 == max_indices.size - 1 ? nums.size : max_indices[i + k]
        
        left_combinations = max_indices[i] - left
        right_combinations = right - max_indices[i + k - 1]
        
        count += left_combinations * right_combinations
    end
    
    count
end
